attributes.action: call upon all the participating nations to boycott the Bejing Olympics due to the sustained abuse of human rights and lives,both in China and the recent deaths in Tibet by this brutal regime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
China really shows it's true colours, by suppresing people who are unarmed by killing,moving out of their homes by force,false imprisoment of anyone who objects, how can western governments stand by and not raise an eyebrow.
I call on the whole GB team and independant participants to boycott the Bejing olympics as a silent protest that these abuses against human beings cannot and will not be tolerated, or hang your heads in shame at supporting such an event
